title: Fudanshi Joushi Isaki-San To No Kusa Fushigi Na Koi
alternative_title: 腐男子上司・伊佐木さんとの腐思議な恋
status: 腐男子上司・伊佐木さんとの腐思議な恋
description:
Description :
        One day, Yui, who works as an office worker while secretly working as a BL doujinshi artist, accidentally hands over a doujinshi she drew to her boss, Makoto Isaki, who is famous for his strong face. Isagi calls Yui to his office and she is prepared to be scolded, but Isaki's reaction is surprising.
